title: PMS 2.0 581 - Aaron Rodgers Tuesday Week 19, Wildcard Monday Night Recap, Divisional Playoffs Preview, Ian Rapoport, Dan Orlovsky, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about last night's Monday Night Football Wildcard game between the Cardinals and Rams, how explosive that Rams team looked on both offense and defense, what is wrong with the Cardinals and if they can be fixed, and they start to look ahead at the matchups for this weekend's Divisional Round games. Joining the program as he does every Tuesday for a shorter installment on a work day, is the reigning NFL MVP, QB for the Green Bay Packers, Aaron Rodgers. Pat, Aaron, and AJ chat about this weekend's game against the 49ers, if this particular year feels different at all, his thoughts on Super Wildcard Weekend, and how difficult it can be playing in the cold if you're injured (44:56-1:01:48). Also joining the progrum is NFL Network Senior Insider, Ian Rapoport, to chat about all the different injuries that could impact this weekend's Divisional games and updates on the coaching and GM searches around the NFL (20:53-44:54). Lastly, 12 year NFL veteran at QB, ESPN NFL Analyst, and friend of the progrum, Dan Orlovsky joins the show to chat who he likes in the playoffs moving forward, his thoughts on the QB play thus far in the playoffs, and ultimately who he thinks is going to win the Super Bowl (1:11:54-1:29:00). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
